user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.<COMPLETION_START>Women are generally less physically strong than men.
The majority of people who win the lottery end up worse off financially within a few years.
Religion can be a major source of conflict and violence.
The average lifespan of a professional athlete is shorter than that of the average person.
The human brain is not fully developed until the mid-20s.
Most people will not achieve their childhood dreams.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
The majority of businesses fail within the first five years.
Being a stay-at-home parent is not always fulfilling or enjoyable.
Most people are not self-aware and do not accurately understand their own behavior and motivations.
The average person will spend over 90,000 hours of their life at work.
The vast majority of people will not become millionaires, no matter how hard they work.
The vast majority of people will not achieve fame or celebrity status, no matter how talented they are.
Climate change is a real and pressing issue that requires immediate action.
The majority of people do not get enough exercise or eat a healthy diet.
The vast majority of people will experience significant setbacks and failures in their lives.
The world is not fair, and success is often determined by factors beyond our control.<COMPLETION_END>
